args.info: Id of the user to act on behalf of (default  = me)

args.name: videosPrivacyAdd
args.info: Sets the default add setting for all future videos uploaded by this user. If true, anyone can add the video to an album, channel, or group.

args.name: videosPrivacyComments
args.info: Sets the default comment setting for all future videos uploaded by this user. It specifies who can comment on the video.

args.name: videosPrivacyDownload
args.info: Sets the default download setting for all future videos uploaded by this user. If true, the video can be downloaded by any user

args.name: videosPrivacyEmbed
args.info: Sets the default comment setting for all future videos uploaded by this user. It specifies who can comment on the video.

args.name: videosPrivacyView
args.info: Sets the default comment setting for all future videos uploaded by this user. It specifies who can comment on the video.

blocks.description: Add a poster to an On Demand page

blocks.name: addPromotionToOnDemandPage
blocks.description: Add a promotion to an On Demand page

args.name: accessType
args.info: Promotion access type a purchase option that is not available on the container. "vip" promotions will always make the content free, and must be further defined with the download or streamPeriod fields.

args.name: discountType
args.info: Describes the type of discount offered by this promo code. Note: When providing an accesstype of "vip", this field only accepts the "free" discounttype.

args.name: download
args.info: Whether this promotion grants download access to vod content. This is only necessary when not defined on the On Demand Container, and creating promotions with the "vip" accesstype and "buy" producttype

args.name: endTime
args.info: The latest time this promotion is valid. If not specified, the promotion will never expire.

args.name: percentOff
args.info: The percentage saved by using this promo code. This field is required, and only applicable if the field discountType is set to percent.

args.name: productType
args.info: Restricts the promotion to a particular type of transaction. Defaults to "any" when accessType is "default", and to "rent" if the accessType is "vip". Only "buy" and "rent" are valid if the accessType is "vip".

args.name: startTime
args.info: The earliest time this promotion is valid. If startTime is not specified, it will default to the time the promotion was created.

args.name: streamPeriod
args.info: The amount of time a user will have access to the vod content upon redeeming a promo code. This is only necessary when not defined on the On Demand Container, and creating promotions with the "vip" accesstype and "rent" producttype.

args.name: total
args.info: Number of promotions to generate if type is batch. The amount of uses for the promotion if type is single.

args.name: type
args.info: Type of promotions to use. If the access type is vip, the only possible value for this field is batch.

args.name: label
args.info: If you are creating a batch promotion, you can describe it here. This field will be rejected for single promotions.

args.name: embedButtonsEmbed
args.info: Show or hide the embed button.

args.name: embedButtonsFullscreen
args.info: Show or hide the fullscreen button.

args.name: embedButtonsHd
args.info: Show or hide the HD button.

args.name: embedButtonsLike
args.info: Show or hide the like button.

args.name: embedButtonsScaling
args.info: Show or hide the scaling button (shown only in fullscreen mode).

args.name: embedButtonsShare
args.info: Show or hide the share button.

args.name: embedButtonsWatchlater
args.info: Show or hide the watch later button.

args.name: embedColor
args.info: A primary color used by the embed player.

args.name: embedLogosCustomActive
args.info: Show or hide your custom logo.

args.name: embedLogosCustomLink
args.info: A url that your user will navigate to if they click your custom logo.

args.name: embedLogosCustomSticky
args.info: Always show the custom logo, or hide it after time with the rest of the UI.

args.name: embedLogosVimeo
args.info: Show or hide the vimeo logo.

args.name: embedTitleName
args.info: Show, hide, or let the user decide if the video title shows on the video

args.name: embedTitleOwner
args.info: Show, hide, or let the user decide if the owners information shows on the video.

args.name: embedTitlePortrait
args.info: Show, hide, or let the user decide if the owners portrait shows on the video.

args.name: embedVolume
args.info: Show or hide the volume selector.

args.name: locale
args.info: Set the default language for this video. For a full list of valid languages use the "/languages?filter=texttracks" endpoint.

args.name: name
args.info: The new title for the video

args.name: password
args.info: When you set privacy.view to password, you must provide the password as an additional parameter.

args.name: privacyAdd
args.info: Enable or disable the ability for anyone to add the video to an album, channel, or group.

args.name: privacyComments
args.info: The privacy for who can comment on the video.

args.name: privacyDownload
args.info: Enable or disable the ability for anyone to download video.

args.name: privacyEmbed
args.info: The videos new embed settings. Whitelist allows you to define all valid embed domains. Check out our docs for adding and removing domains.

args.name: privacyView
args.info: The new privacy setting for the video. Content-type application/json is the only valid type for type "users", basic users can not set privacy to unlisted.

args.name: ratingsMpaaRating
args.info: Set MPAA rating for a video.

args.name: ratingsMpaaReason
args.info: Set MPAA rating reason for a video.

args.name: ratingTvRating
args.info: Set TV rating for a video.

args.name: ratingTvReason
args.info: Set TV rating reason for a video.

args.name: reviewLink
args.info: Enable or disable the review page.

args.name: spatialDirectorTimeline
args.info: 360 director timeline. The arrays in this should include a "time_code", "pitch", "yaw", and optionally "roll". For pitch, the minimum allowed is -90, and the max of 90. For yaw, the minimum is 0, and a maximum of 360.

args.name: spatialFieldOfView
args.info: 360 field of view. Default 50, min 30, max 90.

args.info: Id of the user to act on behalf of (default  = me)

args.name: direction
args.info: The direction that the results are sorted.

args.name: filter
args.info: Filter to apply to the results.

args.name: filterEmbeddable
args.info: Choose between only videos that are embeddable, and only videos that are not embeddable.

args.name: filterPlayable
args.info: Default true. Choose between only videos that are playable, and only videos that are not playable.

args.name: sort
args.info: Technique used to sort the results.

args.name: perPage
args.info: Number of items to show on each page. Max 100.

args.name: weakSearch
args.info: This forces the query parameter to use a separate search service that includes private videos. It will only perform a partial text search on the video's name. In the future the standard search will include private videos, and this parameter won't be necessary.

args.info: The app redirect URL. Required for POST upload types.

args.name: type
args.info: Filter to apply to the results.
